-------------- Sword Script ---------------- -- Waits for the child of the specified parent local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end

local SWORD_DAMAGE = 40 local STUN_BONUS = 15
local INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING = 5 local LIGHTNING_RADIUS = 1 local MAX_SHOOTING_DISTANCE = 50
------- Animations --------- local ShieldBashAnim = WaitForChild(Tool, "ShieldBash") local EquipAnim = WaitForChild(Tool, "EquipAnim") local SlashAnim = WaitForChild(Tool, "QuickSlash") local ShieldWalkAnim = WaitForChild(Tool, "ShieldWalk") ----------------------------

local function AbleToAttack() return MyCharacter and MyHumanoid and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 and MyTorso:FindFirstChild('Right Shoulder') end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) -- Add more tags here to customize what tags are available. while humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator') do humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator'):Destroy() end local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid DebrisService:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end
local function PointOnCircle(originX, originZ, radius, theta) local X = originX + radius * math.cos(theta) local Z = originZ + radius * math.sin(theta) return X, Z end
-- It is conceptually easier to construct the lightning beam pointing up along -- the pos-y axis and then rotate each point by the direction vector local function CreateLightningBeam(start, direction, distance) local boltList = {} distance = math.min(MAX_SHOOTING_DISTANCE, math.max(distance, INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING)) direction = direction.unit local orientationCFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), direction.unit) * CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi / 2, math.pi / 2) for i = 1, distance / INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING do local currOrigin = Vector3.new(0, INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING, 0) * i local nextOrigin = Vector3.new(0, INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING, 0) * (i + 1) local rotationRandomness = math.random() * math.pi / 2 for j = 1, 4 do local currX, currZ = PointOnCircle(currOrigin.x, currOrigin.z, LIGHTNING_RADIUS, (math.pi / 2) * j + rotationRandomness) local nextX, nextZ = PointOnCircle(nextOrigin.x, nextOrigin.z, LIGHTNING_RADIUS, (math.pi / 2) * (j+1) + rotationRandomness) local currBolt = Instance.new('Part') currBolt.Anchored = true currBolt.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING * 1.2) currBolt.CanCollide = false currBolt.Transparency = math.min(1, (math.random() + 0.5) / 2 + 0.08) table.insert(boltList, currBolt) local currPoint = Vector3.new(currX, currOrigin.Y, currZ) local nextPoint = Vector3.new(nextX, nextOrigin.Y, nextZ) -- Adjust because the part is centered in the middle not the tip currPoint = currPoint + ((nextPoint - currPoint).unit * (currBolt.Size.Y / 2)) currPoint = (orientationCFrame * currPoint) + start nextPoint = (orientationCFrame * nextPoint) + start currBolt.CFrame = CFrame.new(currPoint, nextPoint) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, -math.pi / 2) LightningMesh:Clone().Parent = currBolt DebrisService:AddItem(currBolt, 0.8) currBolt.Parent = Workspace end end for i = 1, 3 do Spawn(function() for k, v in pairs(boltList) do if v then if k % 4 == 0 then wait(0.05) end v.Transparency = v.Transparency / 3 end end end) Delay(0.1, function() for k, v in pairs(boltList) do if v then if k % 4 == 0 then wait(0.05) end v.Transparency = v.Transparency * 3 end end end) wait(0.3) end end
local function CloneWithoutChildren(objectToClone) local result = objectToClone:Clone() for k, v in pairs(result:GetChildren()) do v:Destroy() end return result end
local function CreateStunnedGui(player, character) if not player or not character or not character:FindFirstChild('Head') then return end local bg = Instance.new("BillboardGui") bg.Parent = character.Head bg.Adornee = character.Head -- Same size as Head bg.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) -- Above (defaults to inside) bg.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0, 2.5, 0)
local frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = bg frame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1 frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
local text = Instance.new("TextLabel") text.Parent = frame text.Position = UDim2.new(0.25, 0, 0.25, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 39/255, 20/255) text.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 225/255, 73/255) text.TextStrokeTransparency = 0 text.BackgroundTransparency = 1 text.Text = "Stunned!" text.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18 DebrisService:AddItem(bg, 2) end
local BashedPlayers = {}
function ShieldBashBlow(hit) if AbleToAttack() and Bashing then if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') and hit.Parent ~= MyCharacter and not BashedPlayers[hit.Parent] then BashedPlayers[hit.Parent] = true print("Shield Blow") if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') and MyTorso then
local bashForce = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bashForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000000, 1000000) if MyTorso.Velocity.magnitude > 0.1 then bashForce.velocity = MyTorso.Velocity.unit * 100 else bashForce.velocity = (hit.Parent.Torso.CFrame.p - MyTorso.CFrame.p).unit * 100 end bashForce.Parent = hit.Parent.Torso DebrisService:AddItem(bashForce, 0.07) if MyTorso:FindFirstChild("ChargeVelocity") then MyTorso:FindFirstChild("ChargeVelocity"):Destroy() MyTorso.Velocity = Vector3.new() end CreateStunnedGui(PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent), hit.Parent) CreateStunnedGui(MyPlayer, hit.Parent) end if not hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('StunScript') then local stun = StunScript:Clone() stun.Parent = hit.Parent stun.Disabled = false end BashHit:Play() TagHumanoid(hit.Parent.Humanoid, MyPlayer) wait(0.1) if MyHumanoid then MyHumanoid.PlatformStand = false end end end end
local function PlayAnimation(Anim, speed) if MyHumanoid and Anim then print("Playing" , Anim.Name) local AnimTrack = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Anim) if speed then AnimTrack:AdjustSpeed(speed) end AnimTrack:Play() return AnimTrack end return nil end
function OnEquipped(mouse) MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyPlayer = PlayersService.LocalPlayer MyHumanoid = WaitForChild(MyCharacter, 'Humanoid') MyTorso = WaitForChild(MyCharacter, 'Torso') MyMouse = mouse if MyMouse then MouseRightDownConnection = MyMouse.Button2Down:connect(function() MouseRightDownTime = tick() end) end if MyMouse then RightMouseConnection = MyMouse.Button2Up:connect(ShieldBash) end if Handle then SwordBlowConnection = Handle.Touched:connect(SwordAttackBlow) end end
function OnUnequipped() if RightMouseConnection then RightMouseConnection:disconnect() RightMouseConnection = nil end if MouseRightDownConnection then MouseRightDownConnection:disconnect() MouseRightDownConnection = nil end if ShieldBlowConnection then ShieldBlowConnection:disconnect() ShieldBlowConnection = nil end if SwordBlowConnection then SwordBlowConnection:disconnect() SwordBlowConnection = nil endghtGrip = nil end if shieldWalk then print("Stopping shield walk") shieldWalk:Stop() end end
local SlashedPlayers = {}
function SwordAttackBlow(hit) if Swinging and AbleToAttack() then if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') and hit.Parent ~= MyCharacter and not SlashedPlayers[hit.Parent] then SlashedPlayers[hit.Parent] = true TagHumanoid(hit.Parent.Humanoid, MyPlayer) SwordHit:Play() -- if stunned if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('StunScript') and hit.Parent.Humanoid.WalkSpeed == 0 then hit.Parent.Humanoid:TakeDamage(STUN_BONUS) end hit.Parent.Humanoid:TakeDamage(SWORD_DAMAGE)
if not hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('StunScript') then CreateStunnedGui(PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent), hit.Parent) CreateStunnedGui(MyPlayer, hit.Parent) local stun = StunScript:Clone() stun.Parent = hit.Parent stun.Disabled = false end if #SlashedPlayers < 2 then CreateLightningBeam(hit.Parent.Torso.CFrame.p + Vector3.new(0, MAX_SHOOTING_DISTANCE - 7, 0), Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), MAX_SHOOTING_DISTANCE) end end end end
function OnActivate() if Swinging or not AbleToAttack() then return end if UnequippedWeld then dontWait = true shieldWalk = PlayAnimation(ShieldWalkAnim, nil) --wait(0.4) if UnequippedWeld then UnequippedWeld:Destroy() end UnequippedWeld = nil SwordDraw:Play() else PlayAnimation(SlashAnim, nil) end SlashedPlayers = {} Swinging = true wait(2) --Slash:Play() --PlayAnimation(SlashAnim, nil) Swinging = false end
